name: The Blob Assassin
description:
Your goal is to kill all the blobs. Simple right? WRONG!

They might look innocent at first but theese guys live by one principle and  one principle only the LESS of their population that remain the MORE furious they will get in trying to kill you

This game was made for the BlackThronProd#3 GameJam

Credits:

Programming and art by: Technonut

Sound from: Freesound 8 bit Sound Effects Library by Little Robot Sound Factory
